title: Grid lines are invisible in Config panel
author: Eldaw
body_snippet:
The grid lines in the Config panel, by default, are the same colour as the background, making it very difficult to see where to click to enter each field.

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3789849/85200505-dba25c00-b2ef-11ea-85d7-84f1513ca543.png)
